— DISCLAIMER —
All the stories in this video are from the United States, as the video focuses on that topic. It’s important to keep in mind though, that similar cases may exist in other countries, but information about them might be less accessible or still classified. Because of this, it’s difficult to make direct comparisons between nations. This video is based on publicly available information.
